queries.name: custom query 1
queries.description: Top 5 most frequent medical conditions assigned all time
queries.queryString: SELECT medicalConditionText, count(*) AS count FROM MedicalConditionView GROUP BY medicalConditionText ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 5;

queries.name: custom query 2
queries.description: Top 5 most frequent medications assigned all time
queries.queryString: SELECT medicationText, count(*) AS count FROM MedicationView GROUP BY medicationText ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 5;

queries.name: custom query 3
queries.description: Top 5 most frequent procedures assigned all time
queries.queryString: SELECT testTreatmentProcedureText, count(*) as count FROM TestTreatmentProceduresView WHERE testTreatmentProcedureType='PROCEDURE_NAME' GROUP BY testTreatmentProcedureText ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 5;

queries.name: custom query 4
queries.description: Top 5 most frequent patients attending sessions
queries.queryString: SELECT patientId, count(*) AS count FROM SessionView GROUP BY patientId ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 5;

queries.name: custom query 5
queries.description: Top 5 most frequent health care professionals attending sessions
queries.queryString: SELECT healthCareProfessionalId, count(*) AS count FROM SessionView GROUP BY healthCareProfessionalId ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 5;
